title: Chapter 134 - The Snowy Villa
body:
Chapter 134 - The Snowy Villa

When Wen Lingxue left, the group gathered by the sparring grounds quickly dispersed.

“Lingxue, you’re amazing! You’ve only just barely entered the inner sect, but you’re already in the Refining Bone stage of the Blood Circulation Realm. You’re putting your seniors to shame!” A slim young woman giggled as she accompanied Wen Lingxue. 

She was exquisitely dressed with extraordinary features, but next to Wen Lingxue, her relative inferiority was readily apparent.

Wen Lingxue smiled faintly. “Senior Apprentice Sister Meng Lu, you’re exaggerating.” 

But in her heart, she thought, I’m cultivating the miraculous technique my brother-in-law gave me. If I didn’t progress quickly, how could I face him going forward?

“Junior sisters, any interest in relaxing at the Snowy Villa?” Before they got far, a handsome youth approached them and invited them out with a smile. His manners were perfect.

Meng Lu’s eyes lit up, and she exclaimed, “Lingxue, let’s go together! The Snowy Villa is a top-class establishment. They say only the upper crust are qualified to enter!”

She sounded quite eager. 

“This….” Wen Lingxue was a bit hesitant. She planned to go home and cultivate.

“Let’s go~! Come...
